definition: same as 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1] Book of History
abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]
Book of History/a compendium of documents in various styles, making up the oldest extant texts of Chinese history, from legendary times down to the times of Confucius
Minister of Revenue (from the Han dynasty onwards)

sentences.english: We think that Shangshu serves as a link between the past and the future in the development of the history of Chinese language.
sentences.chinese: 在漢語史發展過程中，《尚書》具有承前啓後的作用。

sentences.english: Chapter II"The Research on Types of Complex Sentences in Jinwen Shangshu(Two)".
sentences.chinese: 第三章“今文《尚書》複句的特點”。

sentences.english: East-West Cultural Differences as Reflected in Bernhard Karlgren's Translation of the Book of Documents.
sentences.chinese: 高本漢《尚書》翻譯所反映的中西文化差異。

sentences.english: This article researches about the vocabulary of the words of Zhougong in JINWENSHANGSHU.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究《今文尚書》周公話語的詞彙。

sentences.english: Jinwen "Shangshu" is in the important stage which evolves from monosyllabic words to polysyllabic words.
sentences.chinese: 今文《尚書》正處於單音詞向複音詞演變的重要階段。

sentences.english: The emperor presented the plaque to Cha, the wife of Chen Shen, Minister of Rites.
sentences.chinese: 是皇帝御賜給陳家禮部尚書陳詵的妻子的。

sentences.english: "person" occupied a dominant position in the relationship between the Heaven and Man in "The Book of History".
sentences.chinese: “人”在《尚書》中的天人關係中佔有主導地位。

sentences.english: The new zhejiang straight governor Hu Zongxian cooperate with the ministry of war history, accepted the task of the yugoslav capital.
sentences.chinese: 新任浙直總督胡宗憲配合兵部尚書，接下了城防重任。

sentences.english: Shang Shu is one of the remotest historic literature handed down from ancient times .
sentences.chinese: 《尚書》是流傳於今最爲久遠的一部歷史文獻彙編。

sentences.english: YueMing is a unique article on educational problems in ShangShu .
sentences.chinese: 《說命》是古文《尚書》中專門論述教育問題的篇章。

sentences.english: ShangShu is an important ancient scripture in China.
The second chapter is"side-by-side compound words of Jinwen Shangshu".
sentences.chinese: 第二部分爲“今文《尚書》並列複合詞”。

sentences.english: Chapter three is the exploration of theories of modifier-noun - phrase in Jinwen Shangshu.
sentences.chinese: 第三章爲“今文《尚書》定中短語的理論探析”。

sentences.english: This article is about the literary and artistic value of Jinwen Shangshu, and it is divided to three chapters.
sentences.chinese: 本論文分三部分論述了《今文尚書》的文學藝術成就。

sentences.english: The third chapter is"modifier-head compound words in Jinwen Shangshu".
sentences.chinese: 第三部分爲“今文《尚書》偏正複合詞”。

sentences.english: The first chapter is"composite standard definition of compound words in Jinwen Shangshu".
sentences.chinese: 第一部分爲“今文《尚書》複合詞的界定標準”。

definition: Zuo Zhuan or Tsochuan, Mr Zuo's Annals or Mr Zuo's commentary on 春秋[Chun1 qiu1], early history c. 400 BC attributed to famous blind historian Zuo Qiuming 左丘明[Zuo3 Qiu1 ming2]
place where the emperor listened to lectures (traditional)
History of the Former Han Dynasty, second of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3], composed by Ban Gu 班固[Ban1 Gu4] in 82 during Eastern Han (later Han), 100 scrolls

various sages/refers to the classical schools of thought, e.g. Confucianism 儒[ru2] represented by Confucius 孔子[Kong3 zi3] and Mencius 孟子[Meng4 zi3], Daoism 道[dao4] by Laozi 老子[Lao3 zi3] and Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子[Zhuang1 zi3], Mohism 墨[mo4] by Mozi 墨子[Mo4 zi3], Legalism 法[fa3] by Sunzi 孫子|孙子[Sun1 zi3] and Han Feizi 韓非子|韩非子[Han2 Fei1 zi3], and numerous others
Records of the Grand Historian, by 司馬遷|司马迁[Si1 ma3 Qian1], first of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3]
Minister of War (official title in pre-Han Chinese states)/two-character surname Sima
worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation
